value.name: Greenville cyclist shot to death honored with memorial ride
value.description: Upstate cyclists are hosting a memorial ride to honor David 'Whitt' Oliver, 44, of Greenville. Oliver was shot and killed near Legacy Park by someone while on a 911 call, police said. Police have identified the suspect as Jeffrey Mark Murray,

video.name: Greenville cyclist shot dead honored with memorial ride

value.name: Cyclist killed in dispute; shooter dies in police gun battle

value.name: SC Police Fatally Shot Armed Suspect Who Killed Cyclist Minutes Before
value.description: Minutes after a beloved Greenville, South Carolina cyclist was shot and killed on Mother’s Day, police fatally shot the armed suspect believed to be the killer, according to the Greenville Police Department.
